intro_text: As r_c crosses a beach, shivering with the cold, there's a creaking, rushing sound, like a wave - but out of sync with the ocean.
decline_text: r_c decides to head back early.
success_text: r_c leaps forward, dashing to the other side of the beach and up onto the rocks. They make it in time to watch the beach get lost under a tide of water from inland.

s_c scrambles back the way they came and watches the beach disappear under a flood of water. It leaves behind a changed landscape, tons of debris - and a large dead sheep. s_c pounces on the opportunity to scavenge.

s_c shrieks at the strange sound, paws digging into the sand as they turn and run for home. They are proven right when the beach disappears under a flood of water from inland. Their caution saved their life.
fail_text: r_c is in the middle of the beach when the flood hits them, freezing water rushing from inland, sweeping them straight out to sea to die in the cold ocean.
history_text: r_c was swept out to sea by a flood.
